english.segment1: I'll sing this song just as long as I'm breathing. I'm feeling good, I'm feeling right. come sing a song a song of freedom. sing every morning and into the night
english.segment2: CHORUS. you've got to tell everyone in the land. come on, come on. tell every girl, boy, woman, and man. rejoice, rejoice. that god's been good yeah good to me. come on, come on. I've been forgiven and it feels so free
english.segment3: it's a beautiful thing when I sing to you Jesus. the days are a joy. the nights are all bright. even the rocks cry out your glory. let everyone rejoice tonight. that God's been good yeah good to me
english.segment5: come on, come on. I've been forgiven and it feels so free. rejoice.
